snippet.title: Slenderman's Shadow Trailer
snippet.description:
The official announcement trailer for Slenderman's Shadow. Featuring all 7 maps remade in the Unity engine, giving better graphics, physics, and performance. Also includes the new map Carnival, and support for PC, Mac, and Linux. All the maps will be accessible from a single menu and available in a single download. The difficulty has been standardized across all maps, the sounds have been improved, and we have a new, creepy Slenderman model. A trailer for carnival will be coming out shortly. Enjoy!

And yes, we still have a Christmas surprise planned for you! :D

Coming January 2013

http://www.slendermansshadow.com
Vote for us on Steam Greenlight!: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=110760618
Subscribe to see the latest trailers and updates
